dataObject.content: The picture that emerges is of a system of staggering complexity, riddled with obstacles and cracks, that prioritizes babies over mothers, thwarts women at every turn, frustrates doctors and midwives, and incentivizes substandard care.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Using describing words like complex and staggering are opinions and therefore biased, the author also gives no proof."}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"It is simply a biased opinion. Prioritizing babies over their mothers will change person to person."}
